title: sree kari sreeyam
sahitya: Sri kari shreeyam dEhiShritha jana pari palinianupallavi  SAgari krupa pavithriSaarasa thala vaasiniSarva loka samrakshanisakalaghama sancharinisarvaarthitha pradhayeni caraNamSanthini sugantha poornisarvAlangkrutha bhooshanisarasa naabha vakshasthalasarvatha nivasini dhanthini dharmanginidaya poorva sugadhayenidharmaarthaadi pradhayenidhanadhanya dhistanginidhasa disa naatha nuthangrini
